room_title: Escape room "Deadly DIEgnosis" by Bear Towne Escape Room in New Bern
room_description:
Once in Bombay, in the late 80â€™s there was an elusive serial killer. The police were unable to catch him and were left to watch brutal murder after murder. Until the trail went cold and the killer stopped.
Then one evening in the summer of 2015 fear struck the residents of a small US town. With the same M.O. as the infamous Bombay murders, residents feared the worst. After years of hiding, the sadistic killer had returned!
Caught in the killer's trap, you are given one last chance to earn your freedom. You have an hour to complete a series of puzzles and riddles in an effort to escape before you meet your final fate!
